name: Mudhead: Bogo
description:
MUDHEAD: BOGO | Demo V1.1

Master unique player movement, while tracking gems, generators and key areas to master each level. In 'Mudhead: Bogo' you Take control of 'BOGO' a exo-skeleton wearing, hoverboarding, recently formed creature on a mission to destroy all power generators and drill for gems.

Type: casual, puzzle, platformer, physics
Game-Page
